EmailTemplate.name: Lapsed submission approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Lapsed submission approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Your recent request to submit your thesis under lapsed candidature has been approved.
Please be advised that the thesis should be submitted electronically via the Monash Graduate Education Thesis Submission Portal.
Please contact Monash Connect to reset your Monash identity password so that you can initiate your thesis submission via https://monash-thesis-submission-prod.appspot.com/
To prepare for your thesis submission please visit the link below
http://intranet.monash.edu.au/graduate-education/exams/thesis-submission.html
Thank you.
Kind regards,
_______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
